@notice Registers candidates in a single transaction.
 @param candidateIds An array of candidate unique IDs (bytes32).

@notice Allows batch voting for candidates.
 @param candidateIds An array of candidate unique IDs (bytes32) to vote for.
@notice Returns the total number of registered candidates.
@notice Returns an array of candidate IDs and an array of corresponding vote counts.
